A GREAT BEARD TAKES TIME.

Don’t let your hard work go to waste. Nourish and hydrate your beard with our premium blend of oils to lock in moisture.

For best use

Rub a few drops between your fingertips. Gently massage into beard hairs. Apply after applying BEVEL Beard Balm for maximum moisturization.

KEY INGREDIENTS

  • Grapeseed Oil - One of the most lightweight natural oils. It helps soothe irritated skin beneath the beard without leaving a greasy feel.
  • Macadamia Seed Oil - Has several fatty acids proven to hydrate, strengthen and add shine to hair without clogging pores.
  • Evening Primrose Oil - Both moisturizing and soothing for the skin beneath your beard. It helps calm the itching and flaking without clogging your pores.
  • Avocado Oil - One of the few oils that can penetrate hair, helping strengthen them, leading to less breakage and thinning.
  • Jojoba Oil - It has natural antibacterial and antifungal properties, so it moisturizes parched strands and stays busy fighting the bad stuff.
  • Argan Oil - One of the best at keeping your hair extra soft and frizz-free. High in Vitamin E and antioxidants, it doubles as an excellent moisturizer for your skin too. - One of the few oils that can penetrate hair, helping strengthen them, leading to less breakage and thinning.

MADE WITHOUT

Sulfates, Alcohol, Silicones, Parabens, Phthalates, Artificial Dyes.

Full Ingredients

Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Fragrance.
